question: CCI has recently approved the merger of which two mutual funds in India?
option2: L&T Midcap Fund & Baroda Mutual Fund
option3: HDFC Small Cap Fund & BNP Paribas
explanation:
Competition Commission of India (CCI) approved the merger of the BNP Paribas (BNPP) Mutual Fund and the Baroda (BOB) Mutual Fund. CCI exercised approval under Section 31(1) of the Competition Act, 2002. The approval will merge the BNP Paribas Mutual Fund and the BOB Mutual Fund.
The Parties propose to meger:
(i) BOB Asset Management Company (AMC) into BNPP AMC
(ii) BNPP Trustee Company (TC) into BOB TC. After the merger, BNPP AMC and BOB TC will be the surviving entities.
